description: Eastern redbud (Cercis canadensis 'NC2016-2' FLAME THROWER) is an amazing plant species due to its shimmering deep reddish/purple leaves, making it an attractive addition to any landscape. Its new spring leaves and bright flowers contrast stunningly with its deep red foliage and give it an eye-catching beauty. Additionally, recurring yellow and orange tones in the spring leaves look as if they are fire burning, giving the tree its namesake Flame Thrower title. This variety is compact and can thrive in full sun to part shade while also providing year-round interest. An attractive and easy-to-care-for plant, Flame Thrower Eastern Redbud is perfect for any garden.
